docs.text: Learn web development by hacking around The goal is to learn how to learn web development by making website to funky things. We'll be "hacking" a whole bunch of websites and making them go crazy. Only you will be able to see them. Note on Internet Safety It's not safe to randomly copy and paste script or code in your browser. Real hackers can get into your computer. Please be careful. Note on Hacking We are not going to do any actual hacking because we don't want to go to jail. Opening Chrome Developer Tools 1. Go to google.com 2. Right click on the page.
docs.title: Home

docs.title: Opening Chrome Developer Tools

docs.text: Hacking Google To get start with the hacking / google developer tools go tools . Changing the background background-color: blue; Changing to a custom color background-color: rgb(230, 0, 230); Background Image background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278); Background Image Size background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278); background-size: 100px; Background Image No Repeat background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-repeat: repeat-x; background-repeat: repeat-y; Backgroud Image Cover background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278); background-size: cover; Multiple Background Images background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278), url(https://the-public-domain-review.imgix.net/blog/2020/zoom-backgrounds/zoom-batch-1-banner.jpg?fit=max&w=1200&h=850); background-size: 100px 100px; background-repeat: repeat-x, repeat; background-repeat: repeat-y, repeat-x; Blend Image with Color background-color: #3ab1cc; background-blend-mode: luminosity; background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278); background-size: cover; Blend Image with Another Image background-image: url(https://www.goodfreephotos.com/cache/other-photos/backgrounds/blue-watercolor-background_800.jpg?cached=1522546278), url(https://the-public-domain-review.imgix.net/blog/2020/zoom-backgrounds/zoom-batch-1-banner.jpg?fit=max&w=1200&h=850); background-blend-mode: exclusion; background-size: cover; Making the page the rotate transform: rotate(72deg); Making the page rotate along an axis transform: rotateX(0deg); transform: rotateY(0deg); transform: rotateZ(0deg); Making Scalling a web page transform: scale(1.5); Skewing the webpage transform: skewX(100deg); Using Clip Path Circle clip-path: circle(81px); Ellipse clip-path: ellipse(234px 64px at 44% 27%); Mouse Cursors cursor: nesw-resize; Mouse Cursor Image cursor: url(https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/9632/heart.png), pointer; Resources Background Css Transform 2D Transform 3D Mouse Curosors Clip Path Image Cursors
